str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A reward, recompense, retribution. From a compound of anti and misthos; requital, correspondence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To enlarge, make broad; met: of the growth of tenderness and love. From platus; to widen.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
